alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Prince Edward (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 7:14PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Prince Edward and northwestern Lunenburg Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Madisonville, or near Red House, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Darlington Heights around 725 PM EDT. Hampden Sydney College around 740 PM EDT. Green Bay around 800 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Briery Creek Lake, Prince Edward Station, Briery, Arvins Store, Twin Lakes State Park, Allens Mill, Burkes Tavern, Scholfield, Moran and Kingsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
